column5: Location! Location! Location! This 1 BR/1 Bath town home provides the ideal destination for your perfect Gulf Coast getaway. Quick access to swimming, fishing, surfing and Schlitterbahn. Enjoy all the conveniences of home and all the relaxing comforts of beach living. Price per night includes all taxes. Within walking distance to the beach!
column8: Big Sur- 1BR/1 Bath North Padre Island
